Symbol.Script_2D:
pen kyna
above = (etaisyys >0)
rivivali = 1.5*font_size* GLOB_SCALE/1000
set style "oikea" spaceleveys = STW (" ") / 1000 * GLOB_SCALE
riveja = 0 for n = 1 to vardim1(show) riveja = riveja + show[n] next n
add2 0, -WALL_THICKNESS/2
HOTSPOT2 0 ,0 , unID, etaisyys,1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0 ,-1 , unID, etaisyys,3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0 ,etaisyys , unID, etaisyys,2 : unID=unID+1
if above then line2 0, sgn(etaisyys)*WALL_THICKNESS/2,0,etaisyys+riveja*rivivali y = etaisyys+(riveja)*rivivali else line2 0, sgn(etaisyys)*WALL_THICKNESS/2,0, etaisyys-riveja*rivivali y= etaisyys endif
add2 0,y
! ---------------- orientation
if orientation="Ulkoreunan suuntaan" then add2 0,-riveja*rivivali/2 rot2 180 add2 0,riveja*rivivali/2 endif
if orientation="Näkymän mukaan" then angleViewRot = 0 rrr = REQUEST ("View_Rotangle", "", angleViewRot) totalRotate = (SYMB_ROTANGLE + angleViewRot) MOD 360 SYMB_ROTANGLE = totalRotate if SYMB_ROTANGLE > 90 and SYMB_ROTANGLE < 270 THEN add2 0,-riveja*rivivali/2 rot2 180 add2 0,riveja*rivivali/2 endif endif
add2 0,-rivivali
x=0 y=0
for n = 1 to vardim1(vars) out = "<?>" if show[n] then
if types[n] = "Teksti" then out = vars[n] endif
if types[n] = "ID" then nn = REQUEST("Full_ID_of_parent", "", _outval) if nn then out = _outval endif
if types[n] = "Nimi" then nn=request("Assoclp_Name", "", _outval) if nn then out = _outval endif
if types[n] = "Parametri" then dim _outvalues[][]: _dim1 = 0 : _dim2 = 0 nn=request("Assoclp_parvalue", vars[n], namind, _type, flag, _dim1, _dim2, _outvalues) if nn then gosub "flatten arrays" out= _outvaluestring else out = "<can't find parameter '"+vars[n]+"'>" endif
endif
if types[n] = "Ominaisuus" then _outvaluestring = "" dim _outvalues[][]: _dim1 = 0 : _dim2 = 0 nn = REQUEST ("Property_Value_Of_Parent",vars[n], _type, _dim1, _dim2, _outvalues) if nn then gosub "flatten arrays" out= _outvaluestring else out = "<ominaisuutta '"+vars[n]+"' ei löydy>" endif endif
if GLOB_FEEDBACK_MODE then rect2 x-spaceleveys,y, x-spaceleveys-stw(names[n])/ 1000 * GLOB_SCALE, y+rivivali rect2 x+spaceleveys,y, x+spaceleveys+stw(out)/ 1000 * GLOB_SCALE, y+rivivali else if bold[n] then set style "oikea bold" else set style "oikea" text2 x-spaceleveys,y,names[n] if bold[n] then set style "vasen bold" else set style "vasen" text2 x+spaceleveys,y,out endif
y=y-rivivali
endif ! if show next n
end ! ---------------------------------------------- end
"flatten arrays": !in: _dim1, _dim2, _outvalues !out: _outvaluestring
! change zeros to ones - it is easier to handle all possible arrays in a double loop if _dim1 = 0 then _dim1 = 1 if _dim2 = 0 then _dim2 = 1
for i = 1 to _dim1 for j = 1 to _dim2 if (i + j) > 2 then _outvaluestring = _outvaluestring + "; " _toconv = _outvalues[j][i] gosub "convertToString" _outvaluestring = _conv next j next i
return
"convertToString": ! _toconv -> _conv
if _type = 5 then !length format_string="" foo = REQUEST ("Linear_dimension", "", format_string) !foo = REQUEST ("Working_length_unit", "", format_string) _conv = str(format_string, _toconv) endif
if _type = 4 then ! String _conv = _outvalues[j][i] endif
if _type = 3 then ! Real number to string _conv = str ("%.2", _toconv) endif
if _type = 2 then ! Integer to string _conv = str ("%.0", _toconv) endif
if _type = 1 then !boolean if _toconv then _conv ="Yes" else _conv ="No" endif return
Symbol.Script_1D:
unID=24335
nn = APPLICATION_QUERY ("PARAMETER_SCRIPT", "FIRSTOCCASION_IN_PROGRESS", isFirstRun)
if GLOB_UI_BUTTON_ID and isFirstRun then
if GLOB_UI_BUTTON_ID < 1000 then parameters gs_ui_current_page = GLOB_UI_BUTTON_ID endif
if GLOB_UI_BUTTON_ID > 1000 and GLOB_UI_BUTTON_ID < 2000 then ! vaihdetaan järjestystä
temp = types[GLOB_UI_BUTTON_ID-1000] types[GLOB_UI_BUTTON_ID-1000] = types[GLOB_UI_BUTTON_ID-1000+1] types[GLOB_UI_BUTTON_ID-1000+1] = temp
temp = vars[GLOB_UI_BUTTON_ID-1000] vars[GLOB_UI_BUTTON_ID-1000] = vars[GLOB_UI_BUTTON_ID-1000+1] vars[GLOB_UI_BUTTON_ID-1000+1] = temp
temp = names[GLOB_UI_BUTTON_ID-1000] names[GLOB_UI_BUTTON_ID-1000] = names[GLOB_UI_BUTTON_ID-1000+1] names[GLOB_UI_BUTTON_ID-1000+1] = temp
temp = show[GLOB_UI_BUTTON_ID-1000] show[GLOB_UI_BUTTON_ID-1000] = show[GLOB_UI_BUTTON_ID-1000+1] show[GLOB_UI_BUTTON_ID-1000+1] = temp
temp = bold[GLOB_UI_BUTTON_ID-1000] bold[GLOB_UI_BUTTON_ID-1000] = bold[GLOB_UI_BUTTON_ID-1000+1] bold[GLOB_UI_BUTTON_ID-1000+1] = temp
parameters types=types, vars = vars, names = names, show = show, bold=bold
endif
if GLOB_UI_BUTTON_ID > 2000 and GLOB_UI_BUTTON_ID < 3000 then ! lisätään
nn = 1 dim _types[], _vars[], _names[], _show[], _bold[] for n= 1 to vardim1(vars) _types[nn] = types[n] _vars[nn] = vars[n] _names[nn] = names[n] _show[nn] = show[n] _bold[nn] = bold[n] nn = nn+1 if n= GLOB_UI_BUTTON_ID -2000 then _types[nn] = "Text" _vars[nn] = "" _names[nn] = "" _show[nn] = 0 _bold[nn] = 0 nn = nn+1 endif next n
parameters types=_types, vars = _vars, names = _names, show = _show, bold=_bold
endif
if GLOB_UI_BUTTON_ID > 3000 and GLOB_UI_BUTTON_ID < 4000 then ! poistetaan
nn = 1 dim _types[], _vars[], _names[], _show[], _bold[] for n=1 to vardim1(vars) if n <> GLOB_UI_BUTTON_ID -3000 then _types[nn] = types[n] _vars[nn] = vars[n] _names[nn] = names[n] _show[nn] = show[n] _bold[nn] = bold[n] nn=nn+1 endif next n
parameters types=_types, vars = _vars, names = _names, show = _show, bold=_bold
endif
if GLOB_UI_BUTTON_ID = 5000 then ! reset parameters reset_lists = 1 endif
endif
DEFINE STYLE "vasen" font, font_size, 7, 0 DEFINE STYLE "keski" font, font_size, 8, 0 DEFINE STYLE "oikea" font, font_size, 9, 0 DEFINE STYLE "vasen bold" font, font_size, 7, 1 DEFINE STYLE "keski bold" font, font_size, 8, 1 DEFINE STYLE "oikea bold" font, font_size, 9, 1
if reset_lists then
dim _types[], _vars[], _names[], _bold[], _show[] i=1
_types[i]="ID" : _vars[i]="" : _names[i]="Tunnus" : _show[i]=1 : _bold[i]=1 : i = i+1
_types[i]="Parametri" : _vars[i]="A" : _names[i]="Leveys" : _show[i]=1 : _bold[i]=0 : i = i+1 _types[i]="Parametri" : _vars[i]="B" : _names[i]="Korkeus" : _show[i]=1 : _bold[i]=0 : i = i+1
_types[i]="Parametri" : _vars[i]="gs_frame_thk" : _names[i]="Karmin paksuus" : _show[i]=0 : _bold[i]=0 : i = i+1 _types[i]="Parametri" : _vars[i]="gs_frame_width" : _names[i]="Karmin leveys" : _show[i]=0 : _bold[i]=0 : i = i+1
_types[i]="Parametri" : _vars[i]="gs_leaf_thk" : _names[i]="Ovilevyn paksuus" : _show[i]=0 : _bold[i]=0 : i = i+1
_types[i]="Parametri" : _vars[i]="gs_sash_thk" : _names[i]="Puitteen paksuus" : _show[i]=0 : _bold[i]=0 : i = i+1 _types[i]="Parametri" : _vars[i]="gs_sash_width" : _names[i]="Puitteen leveys" : _show[i]=0 : _bold[i]=0 : i = i+1
_types[i]="Parametri" : _vars[i]="gs_glass_thk" : _names[i]="Ikkunan paksuus" : _show[i]=0 : _bold[i]=0 : i = i+1
_types[i]="Parametri" : _vars[i]="ac_left_oversize" : _names[i]="Vasen asennusvara" : _show[i]=0 : _bold[i]=0 : i = i+1 _types[i]="Parametri" : _vars[i]="ac_right_oversize" : _names[i]="Oikea asennusvara" : _show[i]=0 : _bold[i]=0 : i = i+1 _types[i]="Parametri" : _vars[i]="ac_upper_oversize" : _names[i]="Yläasennusvara" : _show[i]=0 : _bold[i]=0 : i = i+1 _types[i]="Parametri" : _vars[i]="ac_lower_oversize" : _names[i]="Ala-asennusvara" : _show[i]=0 : _bold[i]=0 : i = i+1
parameters types = _types, vars = _vars, names = _names, show = _show, bold=_bold, reset_lists = 0 endif
Symbol.Script_UI:
ui_current_page gs_ui_current_page
nudge = 3
persivu = 10
sivuja = 1 + ceil(vardim1(vars)/persivu)
tab = (444-20)/4
sivunumero = 0
x=10 y=10
sivunumero = sivunumero + 1 ui_page sivunumero, -1, "Asetukset", "" ! ---------------------------------------------------------- Asetukset x=50 y=60 rivivali = 24
gosub "painikkeet"
UI_OUTFIELD "Kirjasin:", x,y UI_INFIELD "font", x+tab, y-nudge, 2*tab y=y+rivivali
UI_OUTFIELD "Koko:", x,y UI_INFIELD "font_size", x+tab, y-nudge y=y+rivivali
UI_OUTFIELD "Kynä:", x,y UI_INFIELD "kyna", x+tab, y-nudge y=y+rivivali
UI_OUTFIELD "Etäisyys:", x,y UI_INFIELD "etaisyys", x+tab, y-nudge UI_OUTFIELD "(+: sisäpuolella, -: ulkopuolella)", x+2*tab,y y=y+rivivali
UI_OUTFIELD "Tekstin suunta:", x,y UI_INFIELD "orientation", x+tab, y-nudge, 2*tab y=y+rivivali
y=y+rivivali
ui_button ui_function, "Hae oletusasetukset", x+tab, y-nudge, 2*tab, rivivali, 5000 y=y+rivivali
colup = 0 coldown = colup +22
colshow = coldown +30
colname = colshow +30 coltype = colname +115 colvars = coltype +65
colbold = colvars +90
coldel = colbold +25 coladd = coldel +22
for n = 1 to vardim1(vars)
! uusi sivu if (n-1)% persivu = 0 then sivunumero = sivunumero + 1 ui_page sivunumero, -1, "Arvot "+str(sivunumero-1, 1,0), "" ! ---------------------------------------------------------- Parameters x=10 y=30 rivivali = 20
gosub "painikkeet"
UI_STYLE 0,1
UI_OUTFIELD "Tyyppi" , x+coltype , y UI_OUTFIELD "Prop/par/text" , x+colvars , y UI_TOOLTIP "Text, property, or parameter according to type" UI_OUTFIELD "Teksti" , x+colname , y ! UI_OUTFIELD "Lihavointi" , x+colbold-5 , y UI_TOOLTIP "Bold" UI_OUTFIELD "Näytä" , x+colshow-8 , y UI_TOOLTIP "Show" y=y+rivivali
UI_STYLE 0,0
endif
UI_INFIELD{2} names[n], x+colname, y-nudge, 1*tab, rivivali UI_TOOLTIP "Title"
UI_INFIELD{2} types[n], x+coltype, y-nudge, 60, rivivali UI_TOOLTIP "Type of field: plain text, window parameter, or window property"
if types[n] = "Teksti" then UI_INFIELD{2} vars[n], x+colvars, y-nudge UI_TOOLTIP "Text to show" endif if types[n] = "ID" or types[n] = "Object name" then UI_OUTFIELD "-", x+colvars, y endif if types[n] = "Parametri" then UI_INFIELD{2} vars[n], x+colvars, y-nudge UI_TOOLTIP "Parameter to show" endif if types[n] = "Ominaisuus" then dim _parentProperties[] nn = REQUEST ("Properties_Of_Parent", "", _parentProperties) _displayName = "" nn = REQUEST ("Property_Name", vars[n], _typeName, _groupName, _propertyName) if _typeName # "" then _displayName = _typeName + " : " if _groupName # "" then _displayName = _displayName + _groupName + " : " _displayName = _displayName + _propertyName ! no need to check, always has a string value
ui_custom_popup_infield{2} vars[n], x+colvars,y-nudge, tab*.75, 20, ! X Position, Y Position, Width, Height 1, ! Store Hidden ID 3, ! Tree Depth 1, ! Grouping Method _displayName, ! Created value description _parentProperties UI_TOOLTIP "Property to show" endif
!UI_INFIELD{2} bold[n] , x+colbold , y-nudge , 22, rivivali-1 UI_TOOLTIP "Bold text" UI_INFIELD{2} bold[n], x +colbold, y-nudge, 18, 18 , 6, "",0,0, 0, 0,16, 16, "bold.png", "", "bold.png", "" UI_TOOLTIP "Bold text"
UI_INFIELD{2} show[n] , x+colshow , y-nudge , 22, rivivali-1 UI_TOOLTIP "Show line" ui_button ui_function, "+" , x+coladd , y-nudge+rivivali/2 , 20, rivivali-1, 2000+n UI_TOOLTIP "Add new line" ui_button ui_function, "-" , x+coldel , y-nudge , 20, rivivali-1, 3000+n UI_TOOLTIP "Remove line" if n >1 then ui_button ui_function, "↑", x+colup, y-nudge, 20, rivivali-1, 1000+n-1 UI_TOOLTIP "Move line up" endif if n < vardim1(vars) then ui_button ui_function, "↓", x+coldown, y-nudge, 20, rivivali-1, 1000+n UI_TOOLTIP "Move line down" endif y=y+rivivali
next n
end ! ---------------------------------------------------- END
"painikkeet":
for s = 1 to sivuja sivunimi = "Arvot "+str(s-1,1,0) if s = 1 then sivunimi = "Settings" if gs_ui_current_page=s then UI_GROUPBOX "", (s-1)*444/sivuja, 2, 444/sivuja-3, 22 ui_outfield sivunimi, (s-1)*444/sivuja, 8, 444/sivuja-2, 20, 2 else ui_button ui_function, sivunimi, (s-1)*444/sivuja, 4, 444/sivuja-2, 20, s endif next s
return
Symbol.Script_VL:
!lock "vars"
values "types" "Teksti", ! "ID", ! "Nimi", "Parametri", ! "Ominaisuus" !
dim fontNames[] n = request ("FONTNAMES_LIST", "", fontNames) values "font" fontNames, custom
values "orientation" "Sisäreunan suuntaan", "Ulkoreunan suuntaan", "Näkymän mukaan"
